availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. H. Brown (Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Elizabeth West on May 8, 1851. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860. Guardian of the Caldwell children following Richard Caldwell’s death.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Wayne, Mill Springs, p. 42.
Find A Grave, “Alexander Hamilton Brown (November 2, 1827-June 6, 1904),” Memorial #118763353, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=118763353 (accessed June 3, 2017). KYR-0001-005-0140.
